content.description:
Whitehorse - "The Wilderness City". Capital of the Yukon. 

Despite most cliffs being small and hidden amongst the surrounding forest, there is great access to a half dozen well-developed crags within a 15 minutes (or less) of downtown. Like much of the Yukon, there is rock of all kinds. Limestone, basalt, granite, greywacke are all present here with still more potential for development.Â 

If looking for multipitch or adventure climbing you're a short drive from White Mountain (1 hr), Paint Mountain (1 hr, 40 mins), or Carcross (1 hr).
